name: eon-ticket
effect: Provides access to southern island and either latias or latios, whichever is not available roaming around Hoenn.
short_effect: Provides access to Southern Island and Latias or Latios.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The ticket required for sailing on a ferry to the Southern Island. Does Norman, the Petalburg Gym Leader, know a secret?!
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The ticket required for sailing on a ferry to the Southern Island. Does Norman, the Petalburg Gym Leader, know a secret?!
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The ticket required for sailing on a ferry to the Southern Island. Does Norman, the Petalburg Gym Leader, know a secret?!
